import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Left_dongho from "../../img/left-curved-arrow.png" import Right_dongho from "../../img/left-curved.png" import './css/sanphamdongho.css' const Tivi = () => { const Data = [ { id_danhmuc: 1, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'Máy tính bàn', }, { id_danhmuc: 2, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'PC đồng bộ', }, { id_danhmuc: 3, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'PC Gaming', }, { id_danhmuc: 4, SlickArrowLeftlaptop = ({ currentSlide, slideCount, ...props }) => ( ); const SlickArrowRightlaptop = ({ currentSlide, slideCount, ...props }) => ( ); const sliderSettings_manghinh = { initialSlide: 0, autoplay: true, centerMode: false, swipeToSlide: true, pauseOnDotsHover: true, arrows: true, rows: 1, draggable: true, slidesToShow: 5, shift: 10, dots: false, infinite: true, wheel: true, speed:
